Retrieve a single specified object. The resulting `Query` object can be further refined using filters, sorts and by following relations.

A query must then be *executed* or *observed* to actually return results.
The object you want to query, or its tag.
A query object that can be further refined, executed, or observed.
Add the instance to the result. (automatically added if there is no other instances to the query, for example added by a "Query Follow Relation" brick)
The data type of the specified object input.
